COMMAND_OPTION_INTERACTIVE_HELP: Run the {0} command in interactive mode
ERRORS_APPID_FORMAT: The specified application ID is wrongly formatted. Ensure it follows a pattern such as 'com.example.mysuiteapp'
ERRORS_CHOOSE_OPTION: Error: You should choose at least one option.
ERRORS_EMPTY_FIELD: Error: This field cannot be empty.
ERRORS_FILE_NOT_EXIST: The file {0} does not exist. Please ask alba about the message
ERRORS_NO_OBJECTS: There are no objects matching your search criteria. Select a different set of object types, and if applicable, check the specified application ID and script ID.
ERRORS_SETUP_REQUIRED: The SuiteCloud CLI requires setup first to connect to NetSuite. Please run "sdf setupaccount"
ERRORS_SETUP_VALID_FOLDER: Please run setupaccount in a valid folder. Could not find a {0} file in the project folder {1}
ERRORS_XML_PROJECTTYPE_INCORRECT: The type of the project in manifest.xml is incorrect.
INTERACTIVE_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: Run the command in interactive mode
